description:
2015's Guide for Owning Your Success & Happiness Potential *30 Day 100% Risk Free Offer!

Have you felt that you're not as happy as you should be?

Have you vaguely heard of the "science of happiness", but don't understand the practical implications?

Then this course is for YOU!

·Recognize Your Strengths

·Create Larger than Life Optimism

·Become Your Ideal Self

·Develop New Empowering Habits

·Reach Your Potential

·Be Fulfilled in Your Relationships

Extending the scope of applied positive psychology, this course is will enable you to increase your overall performance.

Look for "HAPPINESS" discussions on the class dashboard, or consider beginning your own!
title: Happiness: Essential Secrets to a Fuller Life
instructors: Braco Pobric, NLP, Positive Psychology Coach Patrick Howell
